description:
After defeating all seven Death Generals, Taiki and his friends reach the Great Bagra Palace. If they can defeat the Emperor Bagramon there, the Digital World will be reborn, and they can resurrect their fallen companions. But instead they`re greeted by DarkKnightmon, who uses the power of the Dark Stone to resurrect all the Death Generals. With their souls taken away, they attack Taiki`s team like robots... until DarkKnightmon forces all seven of them to DigiXros into the ultimate god of destruction!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Resurrect! The Arrival of All Seven Death Generals!!
Yomigaeru! Shichinin no Death General Soutoujou!!
よみがえる! 七人のデスジェネラル総登場!!
